recipes.name: Ginger Chai
recipes.desc: The authentic and evergreen Indian Tea aka Chai
recipes.ingredients: water, tea leaves, ginger, milk, sugar
recipes.method: Boil 1 cup water and add 1 teaspoon tea leaves and 1.5 teaspoon sugar. Let it boil for 10mins. Add 1 cup milk to the above and let it boil. Add smashed ginger and continue boiling for 5mins. Strain the tea and serve hot.
